website_summaries.verdict: The ViewSonic LightStream PJD5155L is a budget-priced DLP data projector with low resolution and a sparse port selection, but its data-image quality is solid.

customer_reviews.title: Not built for loud outdoor viewing
customer_reviews.text: Pros: good picture quakity and ease of use for viewing overall. Cons: We're quite disappointed that the volume of speaker doesn't align well for outdoor viewing. We want to use it with out 3d blu ray player and for football season; but there's no sensible way to hook up speakers. The mini usb does not work with a mini usb plug in. Overall: We are returning the device and ordering the 5155 to allow for better (louder) sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This gets 5 stars FOR THE PRICE. Yes, I have seen sharper, better projectors. Yes, I have found myself wishing that their was an audio passthrough of the hdmi. Etc. etc. But if you just want a decent and somewhat pretty projector to show your slides or watch a movie in the basement, this may be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Sokol

customer_reviews.title: Missing zoom
customer_reviews.text: Good color and lighting I wish it had more zoom
customer_reviews.author: ROMFox

customer_reviews.title: Not to happy about the sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice.. Just wish it had an auxiliary so we can amplify the sound..
customer_reviews.author: Jack O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very easy to set up. Picture quality is good. Attractive price Cons: I do not think there is any audio output from the pronector so one will need a player connection from dvd player or computer directly to any sound device.
customer_reviews.author: Raaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and very easy to operate. Worth the money. Bright and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S.

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector habe had it over a year and is working fine. However i can't figure out how to open it to clean the filters. It does run a bit loud and hot but i have a nice speaker system hooked upto it so it doesn't effect us.
customer_reviews.author: carebear in kc

customer_reviews.title: beautiful picture, misleading advertising.
customer_reviews.text: The picture was beautiful! However when we went to hook up speakers via a headphone jack, there were only three ways to connect anything, an HDMI cable, computer hookup and a mini usb. None of the hookups advertised are on the machine which was disappointing to say the least. Returning for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Young

customer_reviews.title: PJD5155L (white) vs. PJD5155 (black) not the same
customer_reviews.text: Great projector and was exactly what I needed it for however, the PJD5155L (white) and the PJD5155 (black) are two separate projectors. The PJD5155L (white) lacked certain outputs. Be sure to double check and know what exactly you're going to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: marvin

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for price
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for price. Does up well even in lot room, excellent in the dark. Easy controls, but keystone settings are limited.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Durish

product_meta.title: ViewSonic PJD5155L LightStream SVGA Home Entertainment Projector HDMI
product_meta.description: The View Sonic Light Stream PJD5155L price-performance projector features 3200 lumens, native SVGA 800 x 600 resolution, user-friendly design, and a sleek white chassis. Exclusive Super Color technology offers a wider color range for true-to-life image projection, while sound enhancement technology delivers improved sound quality. The PJD5155L also features HDMI and VGA connectivity, and a RS232 control port. An energy-saving Dynamic Eco feature reduces power consumption by up to 70%, and extends the lamp life by up to 10,000 hours. With advanced audiovisual features, flexible connectivity options, and an affordable price, the PJD5155L is ideal for use in education and small business environments.
feature_bullets: Super Color technology delivers superior, richer, true-to-life colors; Up to 3200 ANSI lumen brightness and 10,000:1 contrast ratio
3D Blu-ray ready HDMI input; Choice of 5 view settings for a variety of usage scenarios
Sonic Expert technology delivers enhanced sound with enlarged speaker chamber and a powerful amplifier
Intuitive interface includes tactile keypad, top lamp door, and optional cable management system
Industry-leading warranty: 3-years limited on parts and labor, 1 year on lamp, and free 1st year Express Exchange

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars14 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
